page.title: 14Secondary Schools.
page.content: Primary schools in Stockport 'feed' a{Secondary school.}The number of{'feeders'}varies but may be 6 or 7. Most pupils automatically move from primary to secondary education at a{Comprehensive}at the age of 11. Some pupils{sit examinations}in order to enter a{Grammar school}or their parents pay for{private {education. Our local Comprehensive, where most of the children go is called {Offerton High School}which had 1400 pupils and 100 staff. In Marple there are two Comprehensives,{Marple Hall and Marple {Ridge.}All Secondary schools give lessons in individual subjects e.g. Maths, English, Drama, Science, P.E. which lead to{examinations at 16}and then in some cases to examinations at a{higher level}at{18 years}of age.
